# Create an egg timer

```
input.buttonUser.onEvent(ButtonEvent.Click, function () { 
    for (let pos = 0; pos <= 179; pos++) { 
         pins.D4.servoWrite(pos) 
         pause(1000) 
    } 
    for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) { 
         pins.D4.servoWrite(0) 
         pause(1000) 
         pins.D4.servoWrite(180) 
         pause(1000) 
    } 
})
```
